articles.description: Google said it will be rolling out end-to-end encryption for Android users, making it harder for anyone -- including law enforcement -- to read the content of messages.
articles.content:
Google said Thursday it will be rolling out end-to-end encryption for Android users, making it harder for anyone -- including law enforcement -- to read the content of messages.

‘Spider-Man: Miles Morales’ glitch lets you play as anything, including a dumpster - Micky News
articles.description: A glitch has recently been circulating the internet, which sees players being able to play as anything through circumstantial asset swap.
articles.content: The bug is graphical by nature, which involves players accidentally taking the image of whichever object Morales is hitting in-game. Gamers who experimented with the surprising discovery have found o… [+2656 chars]

articles.author: Mihnea Radu
articles.title: Lamborghini Urus STO Rendering Proposes V10 Homologation SUV - autoevolution
articles.description: While customers love to modify this SUV with body kits and lowered suspension, Lamborghini hasn't released any other versions of the Urus yet. And the spec of the recently revealed Huracan STO seems like a perfect match for this high-riding supercar.
articles.content: Some see the Urus as a necessary evil while others say it's a toy for rich people with no sense. But it's also the start of a new era for Lamborghini, as we can't imagine the brand ever doing without… [+1356 chars]
